name: Witch Hunter Blackthorn
description:
Game made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 on the theme Less is More. The idea was to make a game that feels like a visual novel, but which uses the "theater of the mind" instead of visuals to support the story.

Controls : Played with up/down arrows + space or enter or by using 1, 2 or 3

Note : Might be worth playing a couple times and experiment with different choices to see the story branching and how certain choices can affect the story.
